author: dlr
msg: Initial stab at thread-local implementation of user-specific locale
preferences.  Much of this code is likely to be ripped out in some
subsequent refactoring (moving away from thread-locals), but for the
time being the implementation provides useful scaffolding from which
to build and test the multi-user gettext-like functionality useful on
the server-side.
* subversion/include/svn_intl.h
(svn_intl_get_locale_prefs): Removed void *context parameter in
favor of just an apr_pool_t *.
(svn_intl_set_locale_prefs): Swapped order of parameters to put the
apr_pool_t last (consistent with other SVN API decls).
* subversion/include/svn_error_codes.h
(SVN_ERR_NLS_CATEGORY_START): A new section for svn_nls/svn_intl
error codes.
(SVN_ERR_NLS_UNRECOGNIZED_LOCALE): New error code for use when a
locale is not recognized (e.g. "es" might not be recognized when
"es_ES" is).
* subversion/libsvn_subr/nls.c
Improved doc string.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/intl.c
Removed #if APR_HAS_THREADS around decl of cache_lock, since we
clean that up in svn_intl_terminate().
(locale_prefs_threadkey): New static module variable referencing
thread-local storage of user-specific locale preferences.
(svn_intl_terminate): Cleanup after our new locale_prefs_threadkey
storage, and our existing cache_lock mutex.
(svn_intl_initialize): Init locale_prefs_threadkey.  Add some inline
comments to the setlocale() block, and use
SVN_ERR_NLS_UNRECOGNIZED_LOCALE if it fails.
(NO_LOCALE_PREFS): Removed.  Locale prefs can now be NULL.
(svn_intl_get_locale_prefs): Adjusted API, and implemented
user-specific preferences using thread-local storage.
(svn_intl_set_locale_prefs): Adjusted API, and implemented
user-specific preferences using thread-local storage.
(svn_intl_dgettext): Leveraged svn_intl_get_locale_prefs(), and used
the locale(s) it returns to lookup the preferred localization.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/lang.c
(svn_dav__negotiate_lang_prefs): Only bother allocating a new array
if some language preferences were parsed.  Otherwise, use the NULL
value for lang prefs which is now allowed.  Updated for
svn_intl_set_locale_prefs() API change.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/intl-test.c
(verbose_mode): Corrected data type from char * to svn_boolean_t.
(LOCALE_PREFS): New set of user locale preferences used by test3.
(test1, test2): Updated for API changes, avoided compilation
warnings by using const, improved descriptive text.
(test3): New test of user-specific locale preferences.
(test_funcs): Switched test2 from XFAIL to PASS (may not always be
true if you haven't installed .po files?), and added pointer to
test3.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/util.c
(parsed_request): Updated for svn_intl_get_locale_prefs() API
change.

author: djames
msg: * STATUS: Propose r15361 with r14980. This change updates the Ruby
documentation to show that the Ruby bindings work with SWIG 1.3.25.
Both changes merge cleanly.

author: djames
msg: * STATUS: Propose r14980 for Subversion 1.2.x branch. This change upgrades
the Ruby bindings to support SWIG 1.3.25. It's a trivial change, and it
only affects the Ruby bindings for SWIG 1.3.25.

author: lundblad
msg: Merge r15734 from trunk to 1.2.x branch.
Fix crash when calling svn_client_lock/_unlock with no targets.
Votes:
+1: lundblad, kfogel, dlr

author: lundblad
msg: Merge r15737 from trunk to 1.2.x branch.
Fix crash in javahl with revision with no dates.
Votes:
+1: pmayweg
+0: lundblad, dlr
